definition[0]: pain in your stomach or near your stomach
example[0]: He said he had a stomachache and didn't want to go to school.
definition[1]: pain or uncomfortable feelings that you get when your stomach cannot break down food that you have eaten
example[3]: If I eat onions, they give me indigestion.
definition[2]: a stomach illness caused by eating food that contains harmful bacteria, so that you vomit
example[4]: I got food poisoning while I was on holiday and had to spend the day in bed.
example[5]: Two of the customers has to be taken to hospital with suspected food poisoning.
definition[3]: the feeling that you have when you think you are going to vomit
example[6]: A feeling of nausea suddenly came over me.
definition[4]: the condition of having difficulty in getting rid of solid waste from your body
definition[5]: an illness in which waste from the bowels is watery and comes out often
example[8]: The main symptoms are diarrhoea and vomiting.
example[9]: Some dairy products can cause diarrhoea.
